ticket.title: joins uses association name, where uses table name
ticket.original-body:
This does not work (uses association name in both joins and where - this is the expected behavior): shipping_info_query = ProductExtra.joins(:field).where(:product_id => product_id, :field => {:code => 'shipping_info'})
This does not work either (uses table name in both joins and where): shipping_info_query = ProductExtra.joins(:product_extra_field).where(:product_id => product_id, :product_extra_fields => {:code => 'shipping_info'}) OR shipping_info_query = ProductExtra.joins(:product_extra_fields).where(:product_id => product_id, :product_extra_fields => {:code => 'shipping_info'})
This works (joins uses association name, where uses table name, which is confusing): shipping_info_query = ProductExtra.joins(:field).where(:product_id => product_id, :product_extra_fields => {:code => 'shipping_info'})
